title: Magpie, a dangerous affliction for a printer?
content:
[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/3503967.stm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108204447/http:/news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/3503967.stm)   
   
Just learned from this article that the Latin for Magpie is pica. How charming - I wonder if Vince Connare knows. Have any printers or typographers suffered from pica and lived to tell the tale?
author: lorp

comments.content:
Is this where the term "lead-belly" comes from?   
   
ewww. pad pun. sorry.
